alert.note: Alert for Foard; Hardeman; Wilbarger (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 31 at 8:13PM CDT until May 31 at 9:00PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Jackson County in southwestern Oklahoma... Southwestern Kiowa County in southwestern Oklahoma... Northwestern Tillman County in southwestern Oklahoma... Southeastern Greer County in southwestern Oklahoma... Northern Foard County in northern Texas... Northwestern Wilbarger County in northern Texas... Hardeman County in northern Texas... * Until 900 PM CDT. * At 812 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 4 miles northwest of Blair to 3 miles east of Eldorado to 9 miles southwest of Goodlett, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and ping pong ball size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations impacted include... Altus, Mangum, Quanah, Crowell, Tipton, Blair, Chillicothe, Olustee, Eldorado, Martha, Elmer, Headrick, Friendship, Altus Air Force Base, Margaret, Warren, Fargo, Medicine Mound, Humphreys and Odell. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
